title: Large-Scale Interactive Mini-Case-Based Pharmacotherapy Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pharmacology and disease management knowledge
context.additional_context: Blended learning program designed for working professionals to apply real clinical scenarios encountered during work

learning_goals: Learners can adapt three or more chronic disease treatment protocols contextually through interactive mini-cases
Learners can analyze drug interaction and side effect cases to identify risk factors with over 80% accuracy
Learners can produce practical medication therapy guidelines applicable to real work environments as team-based project outcomes
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
